name: Schlemmer Catcher
description:
Oh no! Your cattle has escaped! you better go and get them before they wander off too far...

Game made with Unity, for a school project. Hope you'll enjoy!

CREDITS:

Musics & Sounds: 

 http://www.glitchthegame.com/downloads/,

Yealt Music Boxes on Youtube,

SFXR.

Characters are based off of Oskar Schlemmer's Triadic Ballet and Solaire of Astora
